|eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=4.9 to 5.9GHz Power Amplifier IC;RFMD;SZA-5044Z;SZA, 5044Z, C1327;2;InGaP/GaAs;QFN-20;4 mm x 4 mm; |flags=high power |stock_boot=RedBoot; |stock_os=Linux;2.4.27-ubnt0;AirOS; |tp_firmware=DD-WRT |802dot11_protocols=a |default_ssid=UBNT |default_ssid_regex=^UBNT$ |default_ip=192.168.1.20 |default_user=ubnt |default_pass=ubnt |oui=00:15:6D |oui_eth=00:15:6D |default_ch= }} {{ProductPage|http://www.ubnt.com/ls5}} :[http://dl.ubnt.com/ls5_datasheet.pdf Datasheet] [http://wiki.openwrt.org/oldwiki/OpenWrtDocs/Hardware/Ubiquiti/LiteStation5 On the OpenWrt wiki] {{TechInfoDepot|Ubiquiti_Networks_LiteStation5}} [http://www.ubnt.com/compliance Ubiquiti's FCC ID list] Per '''Ubiquiti''''s datasheet... *The dimensions of the board are ~ [[Dimensions::106.3 mm x 81.3 mm x 16.3162 mm|106.3 mm (L) x 81.3 mm (W) x 16.3162 mm (H)]]. ==Serial== ===Pinout=== Per the '''OpenWrt''' Wiki... 
 1 (3.3)   2 (3.3)
 3 (RxD)   4 (RxD)
 5 (CTS)   6 (...)
 7 (RTS)   8 (...)
 9 (TxD)  10 (TxD)
11 (GND)  12 (GND)
===Info derived from=== ====Boot log====

Default server: 192.168.1.254
